name: Rachee Singh
content: Home | Rachee Singh Rachee Singh Students Research Impact Funding Service Talks Teaching Google Scholar CV Email I am an assistant professor of Computer Science at Cornell University where I lead the sysphotonics group. The sysphotonics group develops systems and algorithms for efficient communication on server-scale, rack-scale and long-haul photonic interconnects. We use these systems to improve the performance of important applications like distributed machine learning and general planet-scale cloud workloads. I am also an Amazon Scholar in the SageMaker Hyperpod teams that specialize in large-scale ML infrastructure.
